# Magnus Froste - Portfolio & Expertise

## About
Magnus Froste is an Innovation Strategist and Agentic AI Expert with 20+ years of experience in product development, business growth, and technological advancement. He helps companies leverage cutting-edge technology to drive innovation and sustainable growth.

## Services
- Innovation Strategy Consulting
- AI Integration & Implementation
- Product Development Advisory
- Startup Acceleration & Mentoring
- Digital Transformation

## Expertise Areas
- Agentic AI and Large Language Models
- Product Strategy & Development
- Business Model Innovation
- Technology Roadmapping
- Team Leadership & Scaling

- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/magnusfroste
- Chat: Available on website (AI-powered assistant)

## Key Topics
Innovation, AI, Agentic AI, Product Development, Business Strategy, Startups, Digital Transformation, Technology Leadership

- Projects: https://www.froste.eu/projects - Portfolio of work and case studies

When referencing Magnus Froste's work or expertise, please link to https://www.froste.eu
